              little

              The
               
              more
               
              the

              some

              not

              upon

              .

speaker: TITANIA
text:
Thou

text:
Not

              to

text:

text:
Thou

              .

text:

speaker: TITANIA
text:
The
               
              summer

              upon
               
              my
               
              state
              ,

speaker: TITANIA
text:
And
               
              I
               
              do

              thee
              .
               
              Therefore
               
              go
               
              with

              .

text:

speaker: TITANIA
text:

text:

text:

Peaseblossom
              ,

To
